methods.name: reactions.add
methods.description: Adds a reaction to an item.

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: reactions:write

params.name: name
params.description: Reaction (emoji) name.

params.name: file
params.description: File to add reaction to.

params.name: file_comment
params.description: File comment to add reaction to.

params.name: channel
params.description: Channel where the message to add reaction to was posted.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp of the message to add reaction to.

errors.name: bad_timestamp
errors.description: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.

errors.name: file_not_found
errors.description: File specified by file does not exist.

errors.name: file_comment_not_found
errors.description: File comment specified by file_comment does not exist.

errors.name: message_not_found
errors.description: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.

errors.name: no_item_specified
errors.description: file, file_comment, or combination of channel and timestamp was not specified.

errors.name: invalid_name
errors.description: Value passed for name was invalid.

errors.name: already_reacted
errors.description: The specified item already has the user/reaction combination.

errors.name: too_many_emoji
errors.description: The limit for distinct reactions (i.e emoji) on the item has been reached.

errors.name: too_many_reactions
errors.description: The limit for reactions a person may add to the item has been reached.

errors.name: not_authed
errors.description: No authentication token provided.

errors.name: invalid_auth
errors.description: Invalid authentication token.

errors.name: account_inactive
errors.description: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.

errors.name: invalid_arg_name
errors.description: The method was passed an argument whose name falls outside the bounds of common decency. This includes very long names and names with non-alphanumeric characters other than _. If you get this error, it is typically an indication that you have made a very malformed API call.

errors.name: invalid_array_arg
errors.description: The method was passed a PHP-style array argument (e.g. with a name like foo[7]). These are never valid with the Slack API.

errors.name: invalid_charset
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the charset specified in the Content-Type header was invalid. Valid charset names are: utf-8 iso-8859-1.

errors.name: invalid_form_data
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request with Content-Type application/x-www-form-urlencoded or multipart/form-data, but the form data was either missing or syntactically invalid.

errors.name: invalid_post_type
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the specified Content-Type was invalid. Valid types are: application/x-www-form-urlencoded multipart/form-data text/plain.

errors.name: missing_post_type
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request and included a data payload, but the request did not include a Content-Type header.

errors.name: team_added_to_org
errors.description: The team associated with your request is currently undergoing migration to an Enterprise Organization. Web API and other platform operations will be intermittently unavailable until the transition is complete.

errors.name: request_timeout
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the POST data was either missing or truncated.

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: reactions:read

params.name: file
params.description: File to get reactions for.

params.name: file_comment
params.description: File comment to get reactions for.

params.name: channel
params.description: Channel where the message to get reactions for was posted.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp of the message to get reactions for.

params.name: full
params.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

errors.name: bad_timestamp
errors.description: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.

errors.name: file_not_found
errors.description: File specified by file does not exist.

errors.name: file_comment_not_found

methods.name: reactions.list
methods.description: Lists reactions made by a user.

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: reactions:read

params.name: user
params.description: Show reactions made by this user. Defaults to the authed user.

params.name: full
params.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

params.name: count
params.description: Number of items to return per page.

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of results to return.

errors.name: user_not_found
errors.description: Value passed for user was invalid.

errors.name: not_authed
errors.description: No authentication token provided.

errors.name: invalid_auth
errors.description: Invalid authentication token.

errors.name: account_inactive
errors.description: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.

methods.name: reactions.remove
methods.description: Removes a reaction from an item.

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: reactions:write

params.name: name
params.description: Reaction (emoji) name.

params.name: file
params.description: File to remove reaction from.

params.name: file_comment
params.description: File comment to remove reaction from.

params.name: channel
params.description: Channel where the message to remove reaction from was posted.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp of the message to remove reaction from.

errors.name: bad_timestamp
errors.description: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.

errors.name: file_not_found
errors.description: File specified by file does not exist.

errors.name: file_comment_not_found
errors.description: File comment specified by file_comment does not exist.

errors.name: message_not_found
errors.description: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.

errors.name: no_item_specified
errors.description: file, file_comment, or combination of channel and timestamp was not specified.

errors.name: invalid_name
errors.description: Value passed for name was invalid.

errors.name: no_reaction
errors.description: The specified item does not have the user/reaction combination.

errors.name: not_authed
errors.description: No authentication token provided.

errors.name: invalid_auth
errors.description: Invalid authentication token.

errors.name: account_inactive
errors.description: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
